metadata.title: CVE-2023-52657 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: Revert"drm/amd/pm: resolve reboot exception for si oland" This reverts commite490d60a2f76bff636c68ce4fe34c1b6c34bbd86. This causes hangs on SI when DCis enabled and errors on driver reboot and power off cycles.
